author: Sára Diána Acosta
comment: It's a useless app. You have to specify everything and it only says "not found", doesnt give any alternatives or closest stations. It also doesn't let you browse without specifying the exact date and time.

author: Matty Reeve
comment: The website is pretty useful for booking train tickets but that's about it. This app is terrible though. I understand that train stations show information about trains, but when you're transferring and you've got 5 minutes to get on, a heads up on the platform would be great. The DB app does this, you should too (and not this dash to make it look like you'll show it, because you never do).  Also, actually update when a train is late. I'm currently on a train delayed 20 minutes but your app is telling me I'm fine, I'm not going to mess up my next 2 transfers, except I am, and this app can't even tell me when any alternative trains will be.  So yeah, thanks for a terrible app.
Mostly love it, but cancellation system/policy not great when you make a mistake and correct within 15 minutes.  Should be less rigid for frequent users.  Tried to correct via email, no luck.

author: 馬杰鴻
comment: Used to be better than that: searching for a journey offers a predefined list of common train stations, but it never learns the ones you often search for. The keyboard is not brought up when searching for a station, another tap is always needed to bring it up. Now, there are no ways to look for a journey, and save it without having an account or buying that ticket.

reply.author: Capitaine Train SAS
reply.content:
Hey 馬杰鴻! Thanks for your feedback about our new logo. We know change can be hard to adjust to and we ourselves are all still getting used to our new face :)

A big reason for the change was that we are now an international brand so we needed a new look and style. If you’d like to know more, have a look here: blog.captaintrain.com/9415-name-logo

author: J J
comment: Great app for getting train tickets in the EU. I had a situation where a train ticket was cheaper in SNCF than here... Many times search gets "server errors"

author: dannie 4x4
comment: Tried to plan a trip from Saltburg to Lesce Bled. No results, at all. "An error occured".
i couldn't change the date and time .very annoying.

author: Sara Bonacchi
comment: It simply doesn't show the cheapest option at all. It's much cheaper to surf on the apps of every trainline company.

author: Ugo CHAMBLIN
comment: user friendly   greater than sncf

author: Campo
comment: It's just the perfect train app ! Better than voyage SNCF

author: Alex Targonski
comment: Used it in Italy. Easy, fast, no problem at all. Love it!

author: Tim Davis
comment: Does everything I want it to and it's really easy to use

author: Olivier Jacqueau
comment: Great app ! Way better than the official SNCF app...

author: Q Qurxii
comment: I am happy
Fast and efficient.

author: Mattia Bertoldi
comment: This is  really useful I used it more than once and it really helps you while traveling. It's so easy to get your ticket, and you can easily reach it with a couple of clicks

author: kwesi asomaning
comment: Its gives me exact time and destination without hitches even one week in Italy

author: Denis Kuzonov
comment: Doesn't work with Czech Railways... Shows stupid connection...

author: Anja O'Connor
comment: Good start but clunky and can't add bookings paid for outside of app
Nice app....it's a very useful

author: Ioannis Polysos
comment: Is the best apps for train tickets

author: Jacob Holt
comment: Simply fantastic. It just works. Only downside worth mentioning is that one can pay for trips in Sterling if you book with Voyages-SNCF or their partners, wheres Trainline only take payment in Euros...

author: Kelly-Ann Green
comment: Makes buying train tickets in France so much easier. As an American, my credit card doesn't work on most of the local ticket buying sites.

author: Tijl Houtbeckers
comment: By far the best build apps for booking trains, and keeps extending where it can be used. On top of that, actually decent customer support!

author: Libero Vitiello
comment: I give it four stars from my previous two, because with the present version works like a charm, providing info on connections, tracks and so on. I haven't used it for purchasing a ticket yet, if that will work I'll go to five stars.

reply.author: Capitaine Train SAS
reply.content:
Hi Libero,
We offer you the option to show a barcode from your smartphone whenever possible. It all depends on the rail operator. When tickets need to be printed, we inform you in the email confirmation. Thanks for your suggestion! It has been passed on the team.

author: Giuliano Mormino
comment: Be aware when buying tickets, some of them may not be refundable.

author: Lawrence Oko
comment: A must have app for regular travelers. Very easy and sample to use, and also accurate as well.

author: dafad dew
comment: Renfe should copy this as an example of an easy to use, good looking app.

author: Arturo Rosa
comment: Fantastica rapida e semplice

author: Marco Garibaldi
comment: An app to buy tickets in Europe with prices in US$???

author: Chaochung Tsai
comment: Very easy to use and buy train and bus tickets

author: Galbrun Rachel
comment: So simple and user friendly !

author: Colin Byrne
comment: So simple and easy to use

author: john rana96
comment: Nice app

author: Stephen Knight
comment: Great app

author: Anagh Chakraborty
comment: Good

author: Vlad Suragin
comment: It was incredible helpful application for Italy travelling. Everything is simple and easy accessable. Also used it in Netherlands - it has some overpricing there but it's tiny problem comparing to the comfortability.

author: Thomas Mary
comment: Connecté avec le même compte, il faut manuellement cliquer dans le mail pour voir ses billets dans l'appli...   Dommage que l'on ne puisse pas importer de billet plus facilement, par numéro de réservation par exemple. Très fastidieux donc de jongler entre compte pro et perso.  Dommage que le numéro de voie n'apparaisse pas en notification ... savoir que l'on embarque voiture 28 siège 42 c'est bien mais savoir sur quelle voie se trouve le train c'est mieux.

reply.author: Capitaine Train SAS
reply.content: Bonsoir Thomas, si vous êtes connecté au même compte Trainline, les billets sont automatiquement ajoutés sur l'ensemble de vos supports. Bonne soirée, Pierre.

author: Waqas Mohammed
comment: Very good app by far
So easy to use. I am loving it  Better than the McDonald slogan
